name: df-dgraa
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cdgraa, cmpt(s0, caa, cinf(crab(s1, cn, wrex(s2, cdif(cfv(cply, cq), csn(c0p)), wa(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s0)), nat0)))), cr, clt)))
comment: Define the degree of an algebraic number as the smallest degree of any nonzero polynomial which has said number as a root. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.) (Revised by AV, 29-Sep-2020.)
